Danish: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
Jeg ved,: Det Forenede Kongerige Storbritannien og Nordirland
hvordan manden,: Det forente kongerike Storbritannia og Nord-Irland
redd, but also bange (archaic, mostly used in standard expressions like "bange anelser")
gutt, dreng (archaic or used in a more narrow sense)
sludder, vrøvl, nonsens, tull, tøys, vås
sau, smale (archaic/dialectal), får (archaic/dialectal, used in expressions/ fixed phrases )

Jeg ved,: somme tider, iblandt, (colloquial:) nogle gange, af og til, indimellem,

hvordan manden,: [meite]makk, [mete]mark, orm (Ambiguous, could mean both worm and snake, cf. wyrm.)
bun (however, can be used for sexual intercourse in some areas)
